channel.title: XP Problum!
channel.description: How do i change how much Xp u get for eery hit? Thanks JCor9 :cool:

item.title: XP Problum!
item.dc:creator: @Ike_TeeHee Ike TeeHee
item.description:
@Ike_TeeHee wrote:

no what it dose is if you set it to 1 - the xp you gain per hit would be 4 and if you set it to 11.1 you would get 44.4 for every hit

so if you hit a 20 with it set to 11.1 you would gain 888 experience

sorry i’m not good at making things clear… if you need any more help just pm me

Read full topic

item.title: XP Problum!
item.dc:creator: @Ike_TeeHee Ike TeeHee
item.description:
@Ike_TeeHee wrote:

This is what mine looks like…

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) { int points = 0; int output = 0; if (exp > 13034430) return 99; for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double) lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0)); output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl; } } return 0; } try looking for some of these things in client.java

points += Math.floor((double) lvl + 300.0
change the 300 to what ever you want your xp gain to be x4 if its 10 then the xp you get will be 40

Read full topic
